articles.title: ESO telescope captures surprising changes in Neptune's temperatures - EurekAlert
articles.description: An international team of astronomers have used ground-based telescopes, including the European Southern Observatory’s Very Large Telescope (ESO’s VLT), to track Neptune’s atmospheric temperatures over a 17-year period. They found a surprising drop in Neptune’…
articles.content: image: This composite shows thermal images of Neptune taken between 2006 and 2020. The first three images (2006, 2009, 2018) were taken with the VISIR instrument on ESOs Very Large Telescope while th… [+8790 chars]

articles.title: ASX to dip as global markets slide on US CPI outlook, Ukraine war and China lockdowns - ABC News
articles.description: Australian shares are expected to start the day lower after global equity markets fell, pulled lower by technology shares in Europe and on Wall Street.
articles.content:
Australian shares are expected to start the day lower after global equity markets fell, pulled lower by technology shares in Europe and on Wall Street.

articles.author: Joshua Lees
articles.title: Russian karting champion, 15, investigated by FIA for 'Nazi salute' on podium - The Mirror
articles.description: Artem Severiukhin, 15, appeared to display the Nazi salute - which he denies - when taking to the podium at the European Karting Championships after winning the 11-15 race.
articles.content: Russian karting champion Artem Severiukhin is being investigated by the FIA after appearing to display the Nazi salute after competing at the European Karting Championships. Severiukhin had won the 1… [+3009 chars]
